pr_title: DHFPROD-5224:Fix issues with "outputURIPrefix" in ingestion step

timeline.message: DHFPROD-5224:Fix issues with "outputURIPrefix" in ingestion step

timeline.bodyText: So is the fix here - if the prefix is just "", then treat that as a valid value?
timeline.author: rjrudin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -37,7 +37,7 @@ let info = {
   additionalCollections: ["customerJSON"],
   inputFilePath: "data-sets/CustomerLoadJSON",
   outputURIReplacement: ".*CustomerLoadJSON,'/customer'",
-  outputURIPrefix: "/customer/",
+  outputURIPrefix: "",

timeline.message: DHFPROD-5224:Fix issues with "outputURIPrefix" in ingestion step
DHFPROD-5224:Fix issues with "outputURIPrefix" in ingestion step
